pkgmetadata.longdescription: Provides ZENIT-POLAR Substitution Cipher Method of Encryption // Implementation of ZENIT-POLAR substitution cipher method of encryption using by default the TENIS-POLAR cipher. This last cipher of encryption became famous through the collection of Brazilian books "Os Karas" by the author Pedro Bandeira. For more details, see "A Cryptographic Dictionary" (GCCS, 1944).
